attributes.action: install street lights on the A1(M) between Junction 1 (M25) and Junction 2 (Hatfield South)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: During the winter when the evening rush hour occurs after dark, traffic flow on this stretch of road suffers due to a lack of proper lighting. By installing street lighting along this stretch of road the safety and sanity of thousands of motorists could be improved each day.
